data.actual_result: Red Box Remains in chat area Settings: iPhone 6 Plus,  iOS 10.1, Canary Latest Screenshot: http://m.imgur.com/MpNjozb
data.short_description: Miscorrected Text keeps red box in chat window after disappearance
data.steps_to_repro: - 1) Misspell a word - 2)Click on it once to bring up correction dialog - 3) Click or swipe away
